summary: WHEN SOMEONE WAS GOING TO DO SOMETHING ABOUT THE  STALLING PROBLEMS WHILE DRIVING2003 FORD TAURUS.   SOMETIMES IT WASD  AT A STOP, BUT IT ALSO HAPPENED  AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  IT CHOKED OUT, THE GAUGES WENT  HAYWIRE, AND IT STALLED.  THISWAS  SOMETHING I  FOUND ON BLOGS WAS A COMMON COMPLAINT BY TAURUS OWNERS. IT WAS A DISTRACTION THAT COULD CAUSE AN ACCIDENT AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.   IT WAS SCARY WHEN IT HAPPENED.  *AK
